intro: I'm Rupert, the blacksmith in this town. If you're needin' to upgrade ya arsenal, I'm ya bear!
It's all free! I just ask ya to bring me the #{font:bold}roar#{font:default} materials.
So keep an eye out for Meteors, yeah? They're brown and gray and shoot outta the sky!
openInterface: Lookin' to exercise ya right to bear arms?
